body_html:
I don't believe there is any fundamental reason to not support it, would just have to make sure that the kernel implementations work for float16.

Marking as "Contributions Welcome", as we'd welcome PRs updating the op definitions and adding unittests.

CC @rmlarsen
body_text:
I don't believe there is any fundamental reason to not support it, would just have to make sure that the kernel implementations work for float16.
Marking as "Contributions Welcome", as we'd welcome PRs updating the op definitions and adding unittests.
CC @rmlarsen
body:
I don't believe there is any fundamental reason to not support it, would just have to make sure that the kernel implementations work for float16.

Marking as "Contributions Welcome", as we'd welcome PRs updating the op definitions and adding unittests.

CC @rmlarsen
